meta.title: Contact Smail Team - Technical Support, Feedback, Business Cooperation
meta.description: Contact the Smail team for technical support, feedback, or cooperation inquiries. We provide multiple contact methods and respond quickly to user needs. For temporary email issues, feature suggestions, or business cooperation, feel free to contact us anytime.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you

success.title: Message sent successfully!
success.message: Thank you for your feedback, we will reply to your message as soon as possible.

form.title: Send Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you soon

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Please describe your question or suggestion in detail...

form.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
form.error: Failed to send. Please try again later.

email.title: Email Contact
email.description: You can also send us an email directly:

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Before contacting us, you can check our FAQ page first, you might find the answer you're looking for.

help.title: Other Ways to Get Help
help.subtitle: We provide multiple ways to support you

docs.title: Online Documentation
docs.description: View detailed usage instructions and help documentation

email.title: Email Support
email.description: Send an email to our support team

response.title: Quick Response
response.description: We promise to reply to your questions within 24 hours
